PDFxTMD Library Tutorial

How to Install

To install the PDFxTMD library, follow these steps:

  1. Clone the repository from GitHub: git clone https://github.com/yourusername/pdfxtmd.git
  2. Navigate to the project directory: cd pdfxtmd
  3. Run the installation script: ./install.sh
  4. Ensure all dependencies are installed.

How to Use

After installation, you can use the library in your projects by including the header files and linking against the library. Here's a simple example: 


#include "pdfxtmd.h"

int main() {
    // Your code to use PDFxTMD
    return 0;
}

How to Help with Development

We welcome contributions! Here's how you can help:

  • Report issues on GitHub.
  • Submit pull requests with improvements or bug fixes.
  • Participate in discussions and provide feedback.
